attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are we paying way over the odds for our diesel compared to the rest of Europe and USA?? Diesel used to be a cheaper fuel but now more people have moved towards this saving It has become more expensive than petrol please drop prices so we have an average price  compared to the rest of Europe 
         PRICE move/mth 
Austria   69.8 +0.1 
Belguim   78.2 +4.7 
Czech Rep 71.5 +1.3 
Denmark   80.8 -2.0 
Eire      74 -0.8 
Finland   69.2 +2.9 
France    85.2 +9.1 
Germany   77.4 +1.3 
Greece    64.7 +2.0 
Netherlan 77.1 +2.3 
Hungary   79.8 -3.2 
Italy     79.4 -0.8 
Luxembourg63.7 +1.3 
Norway    88.7 -1.1 
Poland    72.2 +4.3 
Portugal  69.2 -0.4 
Spain     66.5 0 
Sweden    82.1 +0.8 
Switzerlan77.1 +1.1 
UK        97.8 +2.3 
USA       38.2 +0.3
